##- Please type your reply above this line -## Your request (#30481) has been updated. Reply to this email or click the link below: https://support.combinate.me/hc/requests/30481 Alyssa Venturanza (Combinate Support) 16 Jul 2025, 12:42 GMT+10 Hi Allie, Thanks for clarifying and providing more information. We can keep it as is for now, and if we require any changes, we'll let you know. Regards, Alyssa Combinate support@combinate.me www.combinate.me 1300 247 018 WolfIQ Support 16 Jul 2025, 11:58 GMT+10 Hi Alyssa, Apologies for the confusion. Just a quick note, any visits to http://rawsondental.com/wp-admin will be automatically redirect to the secure (HTTPS) version. A bit of background on the login setup:
  • When we first received the credentials, we couldn't access https://rawsondental.com.au/wp-admin, which suggested a plugin was hiding the standard login page.
  • Since cPanel access was included, we used that to log in and copy the site to our server.
  • To carry out the updates, we temporarily disabled the plugin that hides the login page.
  • It's been re-enabled as of now.
Would you prefer to continue using:
  • /wp-admin (standard login), or
  • /loginsecure46r4t (the hidden login URL - this was the previous setup)?
Let me know what works best, or if there's anything else we can assist with! Thanks, Allie Borcena support@wolfiq.com.au Wolf IQ doesn't just fix websites - we can help you... ✔ Get you more real, authentic 5-star Google reviews ✔ Launch landing pages for new marketing campaigns ✔ Run digital health checks on your online presence ✔ See what your visitors really want with website heatmaps Just reply to this email with how we can help (or learn more at WolfIQ.com/services). Start a new email-it helps us move faster and serve you better. _____________________________

Hi Alyssa,

Apologies for the confusion.

Just a quick note, any visits to http://rawsondental.com/wp-admin will be automatically redirect to the secure (HTTPS) version.
A bit of background on the login setup:
  • When we first received the credentials, we couldn’t access https://rawsondental.com.au/wp-admin, which suggested a plugin was hiding the standard login page.
  • Since cPanel access was included, we used that to log in and copy the site to our server.
  • To carry out the updates, we temporarily disabled the plugin that hides the login page.
  • It’s been re-enabled as of now.

Would you prefer to continue using:
  • /wp-admin (standard login), or
  • /loginsecure46r4t (the hidden login URL - this was the previous setup)?

Let me know what works best, or if there’s anything else we can assist with!

Hi Alyssa,

Apologies for the confusion.

Just a quick note, any visits to http://rawsondental.com/wp-admin will be automatically redirect to the secure (HTTPS) version.
A bit of background on the login setup:
  • When we first received the credentials, we couldn’t access https://rawsondental.com.au/wp-admin, which suggested a plugin was hiding the standard login page.
  • Since cPanel access was included, we used that to log in and copy the site to our server.
  • To carry out the updates, we temporarily disabled the plugin that hides the login page.
  • It’s been re-enabled as of now.

Would you prefer to continue using:
  • /wp-admin (standard login), or
  • /loginsecure46r4t (the hidden login URL - this was the previous setup)?

Let me know what works best, or if there’s anything else we can assist with!

##- Please type your reply above this line -## Your request (#30481) has been updated. Reply to this email or click the link below: https://support.combinate.me/hc/requests/30481 Alyssa Venturanza (Combinate Support) 16 Jul 2025, 11:36 GMT+10 Thanks, Allie. Is there any reason we can't use http://rawsondental.com.au/wp-admin? When I access it, I get redirected to the homepage instead. Just wondering since our clients are used to the generic /wp-admin login for their sites. We've migrated multiple sites, but this is the first time we've been given this type of different login URL. Regards, Alyssa Combinate support@combinate.me www.combinate.me 1300 247 018 WolfIQ Support 16 Jul 2025, 11:12 GMT+10 Hi Alyssa, Thanks for flagging that. Just a quick heads-up:
  • We temporarily disabled the secure login redirect during the migration to make troubleshooting easier.
  • It's now re-enabled, so the admin login page is: https://rawsondental.com.au/loginsecure46r4t
All user accounts are still valid and should work with the same passwords as before. That includes:
  • webmaster@nationaldentalcare.com.au
  • virang@pmgdigital.com.au
  • snehal@pmgdigital.com.au
Let me know if anything comes up. Best, Allie Thanks, Allie Borcena support@wolfiq.com.au Wolf IQ doesn't just fix websites - we can help you... ✔ Get you more real, authentic 5-star Google reviews ✔ Launch landing pages for new marketing campaigns ✔ Run digital health checks on your online presence ✔ See what your visitors really want with website heatmaps Just reply to this email with how we can help (or learn more at WolfIQ.com/services). Start a new email-it helps us move faster and serve you better. _____________________________

Hi Alyssa,

Thanks for flagging that.

Just a quick heads-up:
  • We temporarily disabled the secure login redirect during the migration to make troubleshooting easier.
  • It's now re-enabled, so the admin login page is:
    https://rawsondental.com.au/loginsecure46r4t

All user accounts are still valid and should work with the same passwords as before.
That includes:
  • webmaster@nationaldentalcare.com.au
  • virang@pmgdigital.com.au
  • snehal@pmgdigital.com.au

Let me know if anything comes up.

Best,
Allie

@allieB I've turned off the wpshidelogin plugin when we are working with the site. I've turned it back on,

The logins now would be

https://rawsondental.com.au/loginsecure46r4t

(Time: 5mins)

The site looks good from our end. We noticed that the login page, http://rawsondental.com.au/wp-admin, is not secure. Can you advise why? Also, can you confirm that these are all still valid logins? Will the existing accounts prior to migration use the same password?
  • Default login: webmaster@nationaldentalcare.com.au
  • Other accounts: virang@pmgdigital.com.au, snehal@pmgdigital.com.au
Regards, Alyssa Combinate support@combinate.me www.combinate.me 1300 247 018 WolfIQ Support 15 Jul 2025, 16:45 GMT+10 Hi Alyssa, Yes, I can confirm that the site has been successfully transferred to our server and all updates are now live. Everything's looking good on our end, but feel free to let us know if you notice anything out of place, we're happy to take a look! Hi Alyssa,

Yes, I can confirm that the site has been successfully transferred to our server and all updates are now live.

Everything’s looking good on our end, but feel free to let us know if you notice anything out of place, we’re happy to take a look!

Best,
Allie

Hi Alyssa,

Thanks for checking in!

Just a quick heads-up, everything’s been updated and is looking good:

  • All plugins have now been updated with no issues
  • WordPress core is also up to date
  • We’re currently monitoring the site to make sure everything continues running smoothly

If you spot anything unusual on your end, just let us know and we’ll check it out right away.

Is it possible to finish and deploy within the week? Regards, Alyssa Combinate support@combinate.me www.combinate.me 1300 247 018 Alyssa Venturanza (Combinate Support) 15 Jul 2025, 11:19 GMT+10 Thanks, Allie. That's great to hear! We'll wait for your further updates, then. Regards, Alyssa Combinate support@combinate.me www.combinate.me 1300 247 018 WolfIQ Support 15 Jul 2025, 11:16 GMT+10 Hi Alyssa, Thanks for following up! Yes, Rawson Dental is on our server. Here's a quick progress update:
  • We've updated a few plugins that were safe to apply directly on the live site
  • For the rest (including the WordPress core and other plugins), we're currently working in staging, since the site's a bit older and we want to make sure everything runs smoothly before going live
Let me know if there's anything else you need, happy to assist further.
